content: आत् The letter आ. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Afterwards, then; generally used antithetically to यद्, यदा, यदि and then sometimes strengthened by the particles अह, उ, इद् &c. {@--2@} Then, further, also, and (अपिच). {@--3@} Sometimes it only strengthens the meaning of another word or gives emphasis to an interrogative pronoun like उ, अंग, नु added to किं (possibly, at all).
